# date

**Instance Property**

The delivery date of the notification.

## Declaration

```swift
var date: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

The system displays this date to the user in Notification Center.

## Getting the Notification Details

- **request**: The notification request containing the payload and trigger condition for the notification.
